summary.problem: Over 4,000 calendar events should load from 2015-2030 but only showing 0-1 events
summary.root_cause: Multiple parts of system using current date restrictions instead of historical range
immediate_actions: Fix all date restriction patterns in backend/frontend
Update dashboard API calls to use 2015-2030 range
Verify Simple Practice calendar events are being processed correctly
